title: Experian to Allow Consumers to Create Their Own Credit Reports
sub_head: Millions of consumers don’t have reports and are shut off from affordable lending
body:
Consumers will soon be able to create their own credit reports.
Experian PLC, one of the largest credit-reporting firms in the U.S., this week will start allowing consumers who don’t have credit reports to create them from scratch, the company told The Wall Street Journal.
